html: From April [the #NationalLivingWage] will rise again, by 4.9%, from £7.83 to £8.21… …handing a full-time worker a further £690 annual pay increase… …and taking his or her total pay-rise, since the introduction to over £2,750 a year. #Budget2018pic.twitter.com/VEPhoLj0do
text:
From April [the #NationalLivingWage] will rise again, by 4.9%, from £7.83 to £8.21…
…handing a full-time worker a further £690 annual pay increase…
…and taking his or her total pay-rise, since the introduction to over £2,750 a year. #Budget2018pic.twitter.com/VEPhoLj0do

html: Before Referendum (March 2016), OBR forecast £21bn deficit for 2018/19. After Ref (Nov 2016) f/cast rose to £46bn. By 2018 Spring statement, f/cast still £37bn. In Mon. Budget it will reveal its pre-Ref f/cast was most accurate. So no Brexit-induced collapse in public finances.
text:
Before Referendum (March 2016), OBR forecast £21bn deficit for 2018/19.
After Ref (Nov 2016) f/cast rose to £46bn.
By 2018 Spring statement, f/cast still £37bn.
In Mon. Budget it will reveal its pre-Ref f/cast was most accurate.
So no Brexit-induced collapse in public finances.

html: BlackBerry Unveils a Blockchain Platform For Healthcare Services The blockchain digital ledger will accept data inputs from different sources like IoT biometric devices, individual patients, and laboratories. The platform will anonymously share data with the researchers.
text:
BlackBerry Unveils a Blockchain Platform For Healthcare Services

The blockchain digital ledger will accept data inputs from different sources like IoT biometric devices, individual patients, and laboratories.

The platform will anonymously share data with the researchers.

html: There is no "hopefully" in Bitcoin, a transaction is either valid and confirms or it isn't, and a valid transaction can't be stopped. And you can verify on the blockchain for the rest of human history that that exact transaction did indeed take place.
text: There is no "hopefully" in Bitcoin, a transaction is either valid and confirms or it isn't, and a valid transaction can't be stopped. And you can verify on the blockchain for the rest of human history that that exact transaction did indeed take place.

html: How to improve your listening skills: 1 talk less 2 do not interrupt 3 maintain direct eye contact 4 put your phone down 5 listen with your eyes; look for the unsaid 6 be interested 7 if you are waiting for a pause, so that you can speak, then you're not actively listening
text:
How to improve your listening skills:

1 talk less
2 do not interrupt
3 maintain direct eye contact
4 put your phone down
5 listen with your eyes; look for the unsaid
6 be interested
7 if you are waiting for a pause, so that you can speak, then you're not actively listening
